EmailTemplate.description: Last mile on board for delivery
EmailTemplate.name: AP Last Mile - On Board For Delivery
EmailTemplate.subject: Good news! Your delivery is coming today for case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery is coming today
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are delighted to see that it has now been located and is with a driver for delivery today.
The driver will arrive with your parcel between 1-3pm / by end of day today. If you're not at home, we'll either leave it in a safe place at the delivery address (if the sender hasn't requested a signature), or it will be taken to a Post Office for collection.
Your case will be closed now that your delivery is on the way. You can continue to monitor the tracking for further updates – click here to see delivery options and notification preferences for this parcel.
Your case will be closed now that your delivery is almost there.
Australia Post
